claims.object: A mineral deposit formed from hydrothermal activity.

surface_layer.definition: A concentration of valuable minerals formed by hydrothermal processes.

deep_layer.mechanism: Hot, aqueous fluids dissolve and transport minerals, which then precipitate out of solution due to changes in temperature, pressure, or chemical conditions.
deep_layer.origin: Formed from hydrothermal activity, often associated with magmatic or metamorphic processes.

epistemic_metadata.source: Thermodynamic modeling of hydrothermal ore deposit formation, PDF PROCESSES OF ORE - eGyanKosh
